p: The incorporation of oils 63 and chemical compounds from EOs 64 in nanostructured delivery systems has been used to combat microorganisms. A previous study showed greater antifungal activity against Candida species using clotrimazole loaded into lipid nanoparticles containing EOs compared to prolonged in vitro delivery of clotrimazole. Moreover, increased anti- Candida action was observed for loaded clotrimazole nanoparticles prepared with EOs of Lavandula or Rosmarinus. 65
